parser

Class Arc

  • java.lang.Object
    • parser.Arc

  • public class Arc
extends java.lang.Object
    This class defines an object that represents a possible transition in a Finite State Automata (a FSA object). These transitions join two states (object State) and are labeled by a tag (object Type). The first state is considered as an initial state ('i'), and the second state as a destination state ('d'). An arc defines that the FSA can move from 'i' to 'd' given the presence of a tag (object Type).
    Author:
    benjamin
